verses.verse: I am inquired <WH1875> of by them that asked <WH7592> not <WH3808> for me <WH4672>; I am found of them that sought <WH1245> me not <WH3808>: I said <WH559>, Behold me <WH1471>, behold me, unto a nation that was not called <WH7121> by my name <WH8034>.

I have spread out <WH6566> my hands <WH3027> all the day <WH3117> unto a rebellious <WH5637> people <WH5971>, that walk <WH1980> in a way <WH1870> that is not good <WH2896>, after <WH310> their own thoughts <WH4284>;
a people <WH5971> that provoke <WH3707> me to my face <WH6440> continually <WH8548>, sacrificing <WH2076> in gardens <WH1593>, and burning incense <WH6999> upon bricks <WH3843>;

that sit <WH3427> among the graves <WH6913>, and lodge <WH3885> in the secret places <WH5341>; that eat <WH398> swine <WH2386>'s flesh <WH1320>, and broth <WH4839> of abominable <WH6292> things is in their vessels <WH3627>;

that say <WH559>, Stand <WH7126> by thyself <WH5066>, come not near to me <WH6942>, for I am holier than thou <WH6227>. These are a smoke in my nose <WH639>, a fire <WH784> that burneth <WH3344> all the day <WH3117>.
Behold <WH3789>, it is written before <WH6440> me <WH2814>: I will not keep silence, but will recompense <WH7999>, yea <WH7999>, I will recompense into their bosom <WH2436>,

your own iniquities <WH5771>, and the iniquities <WH5771> of your fathers <WH1> together <WH3162>, saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, that have burned incense <WH6999> upon the mountains <WH2022>, and blasphemed <WH2778> me upon the hills <WH1389>; therefore will I first <WH7223> measure <WH4058> their work <WH6468> into their bosom <WH2436>.

Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, As the new wine <WH8492> is found <WH4672> in the cluster <WH811>, and one saith <WH559>, Destroy <WH7843> it not <WH1293>, for a blessing is in it <WH6213>: so will I do for my servants <WH5650>' sake <WH7843>, that I may not destroy them all.

And I will bring forth <WH3318> a seed <WH2233> out of Jacob <WH3290>, and out of Judah <WH3063> an inheritor <WH3423> of my mountains <WH2022>; and my chosen <WH972> shall inherit <WH3423> it <WH5650>, and my servants shall dwell there <WH7931>.

And Sharon <WH8289> shall be a fold <WH5116> of flocks <WH6629>, and the valley <WH6010> of Achor <WH5911> a place for herds <WH1241> to lie down in <WH7258>, for my people <WH5971> that have sought me <WH1875>.

But ye that forsake <WH5800> Jehovah <WH3068>, that forget <WH7913> my holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022>, that prepare <WH6186> a table <WH7979> for Fortune <WH1409>, and that fill <WH4390> up mingled wine <WH4469> unto Destiny <WH4507>;

I will destine <WH4487> you to the sword <WH2719>, and ye shall all bow down <WH3766> to the slaughter <WH2874>; because when I called <WH7121>, ye did not answer <WH6030>; when I spake <WH1696>, ye did not hear <WH8085>; but ye did <WH6213> that which was evil <WH7451> in mine eyes <WH5869>, and chose <WH977> that wherein I delighted not <WH2654>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>, Behold <WH5650>, my servants shall eat <WH398>, but ye shall be hungry <WH7456>; behold <WH5650>, my servants shall drink <WH8354>, but ye shall be thirsty <WH6770>; behold <WH5650>, my servants shall rejoice <WH8055>, but ye shall be put to shame <WH954>;

behold <WH5650>, my servants shall sing <WH7442> for joy <WH2898> of heart <WH3820>, but ye shall cry <WH6817> for sorrow <WH3511> of heart <WH3820>, and shall wail <WH3213> for vexation <WH7667> of spirit <WH7307>.

And ye shall leave <WH3240> your name <WH8034> for a curse <WH7621> unto my chosen <WH972>; and the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136> will slay <WH4191> thee <WH7121>; and he will call his servants <WH5650> by another <WH312> name <WH8034>:

so that he who blesseth <WH1288> himself in the earth <WH776> shall bless <WH1288> himself in the God <WH430> of truth <WH543>; and he that sweareth <WH7650> in the earth <WH776> shall swear <WH7650> by the God <WH430> of truth <WH543>; because the former <WH7223> troubles <WH6869> are forgotten <WH7911>, and because they are hid <WH5641> from mine eyes <WH5869>.
For <WH1254>, behold, I create new <WH2319> heavens <WH8064> and a new <WH2319> earth <WH776>; and the former <WH7223> things shall not be remembered <WH2142>, nor come <WH5927> into mind <WH3820>.

But be ye glad <WH7797> and rejoice <WH1523> for ever <WH5703> in that which I create <WH1254>; for <WH1254>, behold, I create Jerusalem <WH3389> a rejoicing <WH1525>, and her people <WH5971> a joy <WH4885>.

And I will rejoice <WH1523> in Jerusalem <WH3389>, and joy <WH7797> in my people <WH5971>; and there shall be heard <WH8085> in her no more the voice <WH6963> of weeping <WH1065> and the voice <WH6963> of crying <WH2201>.

There shall be no more thence an infant <WH5764> of days <WH3117>, nor an old man <WH2205> that hath not filled <WH4390> his days <WH3117>; for the child <WH5288> shall die <WH4191> a hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, and the sinner <WH2398> being a hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> shall be accursed <WH7043>.
And they shall build <WH1129> houses <WH1004>, and inhabit <WH3427> them <WH5193>; and they shall plant vineyards <WH3754>, and eat <WH398> the fruit of them <WH6529>.

They shall not build <WH1129>, and another <WH312> inhabit <WH3427>; they shall not plant <WH5193>, and another <WH312> eat <WH398>: for as the days <WH3117> of a tree <WH6086> shall be the days <WH3117> of my people <WH5971>, and my chosen <WH972> shall long enjoy <WH1086> the work <WH4639> of their hands <WH3027>.

They shall not labor <WH3021> in vain <WH7385>, nor bring forth <WH3205> for calamity <WH928>; for they are the seed <WH2233> of the blessed <WH1288> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and their offspring with them <WH6631>.
And it shall come to pass that <WH7121>, before they call, I will answer <WH6030>; and while they are yet speaking <WH1696>, I will hear <WH8085>.

The wolf <WH2061> and the lamb <WH2924> shall feed <WH7462> together <WH259>, and the lion <WH738> shall eat <WH398> straw <WH8401> like the ox <WH1241>; and dust <WH6083> shall be the serpent <WH5175>'s food <WH3899>. They shall not hurt <WH7489> nor destroy <WH7843> in all my holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022>, saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>.
